div.ab:
بسم اللّه الرّحمن الرّحيم
هذا كتاب من عمرو بن مرزوق
عامل الأمير جرير بن ماهان على مدر ورزم أكرمه اللّه
براه لباب بن بيك إنّك
أدّيت إلي ممّا صار عليك من خراج سنة تسع
وأربعين ومئة وخراج سنة خمسين ومئة
والقسم الّتي تجري معهما ثمنية عشر درهما
ودانقين ونصف قبضت ذلك منك وبرئت
إلي منها وكتب في صفر سنة اثنين وخمسين ومئة

bi smi ăl lāhi ăr raḥmāni ăr raḥīmi
hāḏā kitāb:un min ʿamri bni marzūq:in
ʿāmili ăl ʾamīri ǧarīri bni māhāna ʿalà madra wa rizma ʾakrama hu ăl lāhu
barāʾaẗ:un li bāba bni bayk:in ʾinna ka
ʾaddayta ʾilay ya mimmā ṣāra ʿalay ka min ḫarāǧi sanaẗi tisʿ:in
wa ʾarbaʿīna wa miʾaẗ:in wa ḫarāǧi sanaẗi ḫamsīna wa miʾaẗ:in
wa ăl qisami ăllatī taǧrī maʿa humā ṯamāniyaẗa ʿašara dirham:an
wa dānaqayni wa niṣf qabaḍtu ḏālika min ka wa bariʾta
ʾilay ya min hā wa kutiba fī ṣafar:in sanaẗa ĭṯnayni wa ḫamsīna wa miʾaẗ:in

In the name of God, the Merciful and Compassionate.
This is a document from ʿAmr ibn Marzūq,
the financial administrator of the governor Jarīr ibn Māhān, (whose jurisdiction is) over Madr and Rizm, may God grant him honour,
a quittance for Bāb ibn Bēk. You
have delivered to me what you owe with regard to the kharāj for the year
one hundred and forty-nine and the kharāj for the year one hundred and fifty,
and the portions that are administered with them, eighteen dirhams
and two dānaqs and a half. I have received that from you and you have been released
from (the obligation to pay) them to me. It has been written in Ṣafar of the year one hundred and fifty-two.
